error.title: Invalid Model Name
error.description:
## Nodes found with Invalid Model Name
Nodes were detected in your scene which have invalid model name which does not match the regex you preset in AYON setting. ### How to repair? Make sure the model name aligns with validation regex in your AYON setting.
error.detail:
### Invalid nodes
{nodes}
### How could this happen?
This often happens if you have mesh with the model naming does not match with regex in the setting.
